hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to the Merits of the Companions (Allah Be Pleased With Them) of the Holy Prophet - كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا عبيد الله بن معاذ، حدثنا أبي، حدثنا شعبة، بهذا الإسناد وزاد قال شعبة بدأ بهذين لا أدري بأيهما بدأ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Ubaidullah b. Mu'adh reported it on the authority of his father Shu'ba with the same chain of transmitters and he made this addition. He made a mention of these two names but I do not know whose name he mentioned first.
